reviewText:
one of the best female singers ever. she can  do it all dance  numbers with a european flavor and beautiful
ballads. this is so great to see jennifer rush singing and all these great video's. well worth the price

People in the USA should be aware this dvd does not show a region on the product description. This dvd does not play on dvd players in the USA. Had to return for a refund. Too bad, as Jennifer Rush's version of THE POWER OF LOVE is the penultimate version. Yes - better even the Celine Dion's, and I was looking forward to being able to watch it on a big screen tv instead of a pc.
Not too much to say she is one of the best and known more in Europe then here in North America she has high quality voice.

Absolutely fantastic
Isn't she great?
Good picture and sound
A gem for all Jennifer rush fans
